mapper.insert: insert into record (sender, receiver, time, content) values (#{sender,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{receiver,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{time,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{content,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

receiver,
